83804.summary: Some customers in the Dakota Crossing area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83804.title: Oct 15 - Winnipeg (Dakota Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
